title: The Sentinel Sessions
description: Inspired by NPR's Tiny Desk, we're building a space for local artists to perform live in our studio. No big stage, no barrier — just raw talent, a microphone, and an audience tuned in across the airwaves.
ctaText: We're looking for local musicians to perform on The Sentinel Sessions. Send us your music and a little about yourself — we'd love to have you in the studio.

highlights.title: Intimate Live Sets
highlights.description: Artists perform stripped-down sets right in our studio, captured in high quality audio and broadcast live on 101.7 FM.

highlights.title: Local Talent First
highlights.description: We prioritize artists from Huntsville and the greater North Alabama area. If you're making music nearby, we want to hear it.

highlights.title: Every Genre Welcome
highlights.description: Hip-hop, indie, rock, R&B, country, electronic — if it sounds good live, it belongs on our stage.
